definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: How beautiful maleness is, if it finds its right expression.
sentences.chinese: 雄性是多美啊，假如它發現它正確的表達方式。

sentences.english: The researchers were trying to understand the underpinnings of sexual attraction in the male nematodes.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員希望發現雄性線蟲性吸引力的來源。

sentences.english: The discovery also reveals how male squid compete for female mating partners.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現也揭示了雄性烏賊如何爭奪交配伴侶的。

sentences.english: Male mallard ducks (Anas platyrhynchos) are famous for their long, spiraling genitalia.
sentences.chinese: 雄性綠頭野鴨以長長的螺旋狀生殖器而著稱。

sentences.english: The female was spiraling in the air with the corpse of the male butterfly attached.
sentences.chinese: 原來是雌性揹着雄性的屍體在空中盤旋。

sentences.english: Oral contraceptives work by reducing androgens .
sentences.chinese: 口服避孕藥，會減少雄性激素。

sentences.english: Why do male robins have red breasts?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼雄性歐亞鴝胸部呈紅色？

sentences.english: The males in the herd protect the females and the young .
sentences.chinese: 獸羣中的雄性動物保護雌性動物和幼仔。

sentences.english: Why are these low-ranking males taking part in so many matings ?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼這些低階雄性會幹下那麼多好事？

sentences.english: Females are significantly larger than males.
sentences.chinese: 雌性綠森蚺要較雄性更大一些。

sentences.english: "The males care forthe developing young, " she says.
sentences.chinese: “雄性照顧發育中的幼體，”她說。

sentences.english: Males prefer to use the sticks to whack each other.
sentences.chinese: 雄性小猩猩則喜歡用棍子互相敲打。

sentences.english: The female of the species is more deadly than the male.
sentences.chinese: 這個物種的雌性比雄性更能致人死命。

sentences.english: The adult males spend the summer growing antlers and getting fat .
sentences.chinese: 雄性成鹿在夏天生長鹿角並養肥身體。

sentences.english: Mane and frill should be abundant, and particularly impressive in males.
sentences.chinese: 有豐厚的鬃毛和飾毛，而且雄性更爲明顯。

sentences.english: The two traits of the male sterility and brown paddy hull are inherited independently.
sentences.chinese: 雄性不育性與褐色穎殼兩個性狀屬獨立遺傳。

definition: the breeding season (zool.)/oestrus (period of sexual receptivity of female mammals)
population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
